casebody.data:
No. 1085,

Misc.

Johnson v. Ellis, Corrections Director. Mr. Justice Douglas is of the opinion that certiorari should be granted limited to the question of the alleged coerced confession. Bernard A. Golding for petitioner. Frank Briscoe, Samuel H. Robertson, Jr. and Lee P. Ward, Jr. for respondent.

C. A. 5th Cir. Certiorari denied.
